text: Markus Schairer (born 4 July 1987 in Bludenz) is an Austrian snowboarder. ==Career== He received a silver medal in snowboard cross at the 2008 Winter X Games XII in Aspen, Colorado, behind winner Nate Holland.Men's Snowboarder X Final Results – EXPN.com (January 26, 2008) (Retrieved on 30 November 2008) He received a silver medal in snowboard cross at the 2007 Junior World Championships in Bad Gastein, behind Stian Sivertzen.2007 FIS SNOWBOARD JUNIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS – US Snowboarding (January 26, 2008) (Retrieved on 30 November 2008) ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Austria Category:Snowboarders at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Snowboarders at the 2014 Winter Olympics Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:X Games athletes Category:Sportspeople from Vorarlberg Category:People from Bludenz
title: Markus Schairer
